actions.description: The witherling makes two Bite or Spiked Club attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Spiked Club

specialTraits.description: The witherling doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
